item.title: Berlin: „I like to move it move it!“ – Charleston/Lindyhop Workshop heute!
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=34z5DGZMf_s Für Kurzentschlossene – heute Abend Tanzen mit Daniel: The next Charleston/Lindyhop Workshop will be on Monday 26.9 20:00-22:30. I have 1 or 2 spots still available for this course so if you have not already registered for a place, please write to me as soon as you can! This 2.5 hour course will be […]

item.title: Berlin: Lindy Hop, Swing, Charleston Workshop mit Daniel Ludevig
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: Kleiner, feiner Workshop Tipp: Daniel Ludevig hält einen Lindy-hop/Swing/Charleston Workshop nächsten Mittwoch (14. September) von 19:45-22:15 Brandenburgische Str. 46 in Wilmersdorf; Workshop description: We will continue with lindy-hop and swing basics, feeling, musicality, tandem Charleston and jumps. Comfort with basic swing is required but the rest will be taught. If you love the feeling of […]
